content.text: Recent completed items in the elizaOS/eliza repository include several bugfixes, features, and other improvements. Multiple CLI-related fixes were implemented, including resolving issues with the update command to look for the latest version by tag (PR #4714), using beta versions when exact versions aren't found (PRs #4710, #4711), and fixing issues with the create command and setup directories (PR #4708). Docker voice functionality was fixed in PR #4715, and character environment loading was resolved with improvements to the default character (PR #4716).

User interface improvements include fixing the filter for :user in client chat ignores (PR #4709), updating text from 'eliza' to 'elizaOS' (PR #4707), and improving tweet text formatting with double newlines between sentences (PR #4706). New features include adding .env to the plugin-starter's .gitignore file to prevent publishing failures due to key presence (PR #4703) and configuring Tauri for multi-platform CI/CD and mobile support (PR #4699).
Other improvements include making the runtime logger public (PR #4696), centralizing environment resolution (PR #4705), and implementing a deploy CLI action (PR #4712).

Four pull requests are currently active in the elizaOS/eliza repository:

1. PR #4701: A new Knowledge Plugin feature has been submitted by lalalune.

2. PR #4717: Freytes is working on a work-in-progress feature to execute buys on strategies using the plugin-jupiter.

3. PR #4705: wtfsayo has submitted a chore PR to further centralize environment resolution.

4. PR #4699: lalalune has configured Tauri for multi-platform CI/CD and added mobile support.

From May 22-23, 2025, the elizaos/eliza repository had 19 new pull requests with 14 of them merged. There were no new issues reported during this period. The repository had 14 active contributors working on it.

The source provides information about the top contributors for the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository. However, no specific details about the contributors or their contributions are provided in the source text.
